error_invalid_url.message: The tab is not a valid web page.

error_no_html.message: Failed to retrieve the page HTML.

no_magnets.message: No magnet links found on the page.

no_links_found.message: No magnet or torrent links found on the page.

extension_description.message: Search for magnet links on the current page, copy them to the clipboard, and download them as a text file.
